description: Performs comprehensive text analysis including statistics, keywords, and sentiment
explanation: This plugin analyzes text content to extract statistics (word count, sentence count, etc.), identify keywords, and perform basic sentiment analysis. It can perform all analyses or specific types based on input parameters.

inputDefinitions.name: analysis_type
inputDefinitions.description: Type of analysis to perform: 'all', 'statistics', 'keywords', or 'sentiment' (default: 'all')

inputDefinitions.name: keyword_count
inputDefinitions.description: Number of top keywords to extract (default: 10)

outputDefinitions.name: statistics
outputDefinitions.description: Text statistics including word count, character count, sentence count, etc.

outputDefinitions.name: keywords
outputDefinitions.description: Array of top keywords with their frequencies

outputDefinitions.name: sentiment
outputDefinitions.description: Sentiment analysis results including label, score, and confidence

inputGuidance: IMPORTANT: You must use 'text' for content to analyze and 'analysisType' for analysis type

configuration.name: max_keywords
configuration.description: Maximum number of keywords to extract
